content:
You've been hired to work in the noose factory, making nooses to send out to mafia affected towns. Due to the low supply of nooses around, everyone that showed interest has also been hired, this means that some of you would like the noose factory to close down.

To succeed in your work here, the management of the noose factory would like you to test the nooses amongst yourselves before the great distribution can be begin. This task will begin as of you starting work here tomorrow.

Living Playerspisskop Vanilla Townie
Ponystar17 Vanilla Townie
MonkeyMan576 Vanilla Townie
BlueBloodedToffee Vanilla Townie
Boonskiies Vanilla Townie
House Vanilla Townie
curiouskarmadog (replaces Luca Blight) Town Doctor
randomidget Town 1-Shot Vigilante
Kaboose (replaces Always Mafia) Vanilla Townie


Dead Playersploben Mafia Goon Lynched Day 1
Slandaar Vanilla Townie Killed Night 1
tip Mafia New Recruit Lynched Day 2
Zebulin, Town Jack of all Trades Killed Night 2
Boonskiies, Mafia Encryptor Lynched Day 3


RULES
  1. Sitewide rules and guidelines apply.
  2. Do not quote or link to anything cannot be freely accessed by everybody else reading the thread.
  3. Discussion about this game is only allowed to happen within this thread unless especially told otherwise via your role pm.
  4. Avoid formatting in your posts in ways with affect readability of the game.
  5. Once revealed as dead, you are not allowed to post in thread, this includes any “Bah!” posts, until endgame where I have declared the winner.
  6. Prods will be issued to those not posting in the thread for 48 hours, without declaring V/LA either bolded in thread, via pm to the mod or using V/LA tags.
  7. Replacements will occur if you don't post within 24 hours of me sending a prod, or you're receiving a 5th prod. Prods issued in the same day phase as another prod count double.
  8. Replacement searches can be cancelled by posting before I find a replacement.
  9. You may either use
    VOTE: tags or
    Vote: bold to vote during the day.
    1. Unvotes are appreciated however they are not required.
    2. Abbreviations of usernames will count as long as I can identify who it is you're trying to vote.
    3. To lynch someone you will require more than 50.1% of the votes available.
    4. If there is no one above that level of votes at deadline, the day will end in a no lynch
  10. Day deadlines will be set at 2 weeks, night deadlines will be set at 48 hours

Spoiler: Sample Role PM
Welcome to Mini Normal [<PLAYERNAME>];

You are a Vanilla Townie

You have no special abilities.
You win with the town when all threats to the town are dead, and at least one member of your faction is still alive.
Please confirm you have understood your role via return pm.

Game thread is located here

Contracts are out for those starting work in the Noose Factory tomorrow. (role pms are out)

Your first day on the job will start once I have 10 of them signed. (day starts after at least 10 confirmations)

Welcome to your First Day!

As you work here, we're going to occasionally ask for volunteers to help with the strength testing of our products. The first one of these tests will be within 2 weeks.

Probably should've done this earlier.

The way I see it, town versus town arguments are arguments between players based around circumstantial evidence like reads, and neither side is usually gunning for the other, instead trying to get reads. If the scumread seems town throughout the argument, then the argument drops. If the scumread seems like mafia, then he's probably mafia. Town versus mafia arguments tend to focuse around hard evidence like lies or obvious scumtells, and both sides are desperately trying to get the other lynched. The way mafia can spin a town hating them to its favor is OMGUS the townie (or see the townie coming and accuse him/her first) and fill the pages with lots of filler text no one but the accused quite understands. This is what I think's going on with tip and randomidget. The troublesome part is figuring out who's right and who's BSing.
